name: Grovyle
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Mudkip

Attack1Text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokemon (before they affect the damage.).

name: Jirachi

name: Beldum
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Metal Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Metang.

name: Chimecho
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches each Defending Pokemon with his or her Benched Pokemon. If your opponent has only 1 Benched Pokemon, you choose the Defending Pokemon to switch.
Attack2Text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Active Pokemon. Each Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Flygon
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Celebi
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Suicune
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Suicune, discard an Energy card attached to Suicune. (You can't attach a Water Energy card from your hand if Suicune has no Energy cards attached.)
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Typhlosion
AbilityText: As long as Typhlosion is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Typhlosion.

name: Mew
